nodes.text: The Imperial garrison on Coyerti was charged with defending the biotoxin resources controlled by the Empire. It was put to the test in 1 ABY when the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry invaded during the Mid Rim Retreat. The Coyerti garrision was defeated during the planet-wide battle, as the 61st was successful in destroying the biotoxin facilities and defending the Coyerti species.
The Coyerti garrison first appeared in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
